HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: • Fixed a bug with orbital traders with no specializations getting incorrectly generated arrival notifications.

• Fixed a compatibility issue that would sometimes prevent traders from having any cargo. • The zoological trader from Zoological Traders will now purchase any exotic animal part, including those from mods such as Alpha Animals or Dinosauria. • Custom names for orbital traders are now more common. • Genetics suppliers now get names specific to them. • Bio-engineering supplier specific trader names. • Add some extra names options for the vanilla traders.

The customizable silver stock feature has been removed from TraderGen, and has been released as a standalone mod called Customizable Silver Stock which is linked in this news item.|This removal is savegame compatible so your existing games will be safe.
